restrictionInstructions.dataDistribution: To be made available to all S1000D users.

exportRegistrationStmt.simplePara: Export of this data module to all countries that are the residence of organizations that are users of S1000D is permitted. Storage of this data module is to be at the discretion of the organization.

restrictionInstructions.dataHandling: There are no specific handling instructions for this data module.
restrictionInstructions.dataDestruction: Users may destroy this data module in accordance with their own local procedures.
restrictionInstructions.dataDisclosure: There are no dissemination limitations that apply to this data module.

copyright.copyrightPara: The details for copyright can be found in the S1000D Specification.

restrictionInfo.dataConds: There are no known conditions that would change the data restrictions for, or security classification of, this data module.

responsiblePartnerCompany.enterpriseName: AEROSPACE, SECURITY AND DEFENCE INDUSTRIES ASSOCIATION OF EUROPE

originator.enterpriseName: AEROSPACE, SECURITY AND DEFENCE INDUSTRIES ASSOCIATION OF EUROPE

reasonForUpdate.simplePara: Illustrations in Flash format are a possible security threat

commonInfo.title: Introduction to the Bike BREX DM
commonInfo.para:
The Bike BREX data module has primarily been developed to
serve as an example of how a BREX data module is meant to be used
to control and guide the continuous development of the Bike data set
The Bike BREX will be subject of continuous enhancements to ensure that each new specification issue is appropriately represented in the BREX module.

structureObjectRule.objectValue: Function, data for plans and description
List of pages or data modules See also code 00R and code 00S
Functional item numbers common information repository
Access panels and doors common information repository
Supplies - List of products common information repository
Supplies - List of requirements common information repository
Controls and indicators common information repository
Warnings - List of warnings in the common information repository
Cautions - List of cautions in the common information repository
Terminology repository - A list of reusable terms and definitions in the common information repository
General warnings and cautions and related safety data
Description of how it is made
Description of function attributed to crew (functional breakdown)
Change = Remove and install a new item

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Sequential (numbered) lists not allowed unless in descriptive data modules
Notes are not allowed in Warnings
Ordered lists are not allowed in Warnings
Definition lists are not allowed in Warnings
Random lists must not be nested within Warnings
Random list titles are not allowed in Warnings
Notes are not allowed in Cautions
Ordered lists are not allowed in Cautions
Definition lists are not allowed in Cautions
Random lists must not be nested within Cautions
Random list titles are not allowed in Cautions

structureObjectRule.objectValue: Acronym (Candidate for list of abbreviations) - Default value
Spec (Candidate for list of applicable specs)
1 (lowest level of security classification, eg Unclassified)

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Priority level of a comment required
Type of crew member required for drill or procedural step
Types of aircrew drills do not apply to the Bike DMs

structureObjectRule.objectValue: Italic (only for legacy data, see Chap 3.9.1)
Underline (only for legacy data, see Chap 3.9.1)
Strikethrough (not to be used to mark deleted text)

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Prefix of 'randomList' items, limited to three variants
structureObjectRule.objectValue: Unorder (Depending on list level, prefix with short dash for first level, bullet for second, and short dash for third level - ISOpub: bull, dash) - Default value

structureObjectRule.objectUse: Type of response to a comment
Unit of measurement for the threshold interval
indicates the impact of not complying with the requirement
Quantity data unit of measure - for further information refer to Chap 3.9.6.2 and the corresponding xml table

notationRule.objectUse: Flash animation is not allowed in the project

nonContextRule.simplePara: Bike data modules must be reviewed and approved by EPWG before publishing.
The Bike data set must contain examples of how to apply constructs and principles representing various levels of concept sophistication.
